name: Simple telegram reskin
description: You can choose which color telegram web chat will look like and now the webpage adapts to the entire width of the screen available.
additional_info:
To change the color type the following values for:

Cyan:   0 or 360 (default look)
Purple: 90
Red:    180
Green:  270

Any value between will be a different color eg. between red and green values may result in YELLOW!

style_settings.label: To change color type a number from 1 to 360 (default is cyan). ->
